meanings.definition: The quality or state of being preposterous.
meanings.sent1: The preposterousnesses of the situation left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent2: Her story was filled with preposterousnesses that made us all laugh.
meanings.sent3: The preposterousnesses of the clown's outfit made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The preposterousnesses of the idea seemed to defy all logic.
meanings.sent5: The preposterousnesses of the conspiracy theory made it hard to believe.

meanings.definition: Something that is absurd or ridiculous.
meanings.sent1: The movie was full of preposterousnesses that made it entertaining.
meanings.sent2: His excuses for being late were just preposterousnesses.
meanings.sent3: The preposterousnesses of the cat wearing a hat made us chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The preposterousnesses of the plan were evident from the start.
meanings.sent5: The preposterousnesses of the fashion trend caught everyone's attention.
